text: Thanhha Lai (born 1965) is an American writer who was born in Vietnam. She won the 2011 National Book Award for Young People's Literature "National Book Awards â€“ 2011". National Book Foundation (NBF). Retrieved 2012-04-16. (With acceptance speech by Lai; interview, reading, and other material replicated for all five Young People's Literature authors and books.) and a Newbery Medal"Newbery Medal and Honor Books, 1922-Present" .
